item.title: Intro to Python
item.description: A glimpse into some python tools I have learned in my Computational Biology course. R and Python Reticulate package allows R and Python to interact with each other. # R code library(reticulate) la<-"indian" # Python code import re la="blanket" # R code: access R-defined objects with r cat(c(la,py$la)) ## indian blanket # Python code: access Python-defined objects with py$ print(r.la,la) ## indian blanket Regular Expressions (regex) Regular Expressions search for defined patterns in a block of text.
